description.value:
A Single Trip from one place to another on a planet. Aboard a Light Civilian Ground Vehicle, or an Atmospheric Flight, will get you where you need to go.

Requirements

Cost of service may vary with location and the honesty/charitability of those that offer it.

Effect: Common

Notes: 20 T
description.summary: A Single Trip from one place to another on a planet. Aboard a Light Civilian Ground Vehicle, or an Atmospheric Flight, will get you where you need to go.
